name: Rapala® Pro Bass Fishing
description: With Rapala® Pro Bass Fishing you get the ultimate fishing experience: Authentic pro experience – use the same tools that the pros use including an unequaled assortment of Rapala lures Challenge your friends in a variety of competitive fishing and angling challenges Exciting tournament action with announcer commentary, live updates, competitive leaderboards, analysis, and heart-pounding final weigh-ins! Take control of the Wii U™ GamePad and use it to: Cast and reel in the ultimate trophy fish. Drive a boat and explore 7 legendary lakes. Find fishing hot spots with fish finder and map displays.
